channel.title: Homes on Anqi (Angie) Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Anqi (Angie) Liu

item.description: I am an incoming Assistant Professor in the CS department of Johns Hopkins University. My research interest lies in machine learning and its applications. I am currently working on distributionally robust learning, distribution shift, and interactive machine learning. I am particularly interested in safety-critical applications and the social impact of AI. I aim to design principled learning methods for building more human-compatible systems in the real world. I worked with Prof.
